# MOVIE SETTING

Adjust movie-recording options.

To display options for movie recording, press **MENU/OK** in the shooting display and select the !Movie Setting Icon **(MOVIE SETTING)** tab.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The options available vary with the shooting mode selected.

## MOVIE MODE

Before shooting movies, choose the frame rate, bit rate, and frame size and aspect ratio.

!Movie Mode Menu

1. In the shooting menu, select !Movie Setting Icon **MOVIE SETTING**, then highlight **MOVIE MODE** and press **MENU/OK**.

2. Press the focus stick (focus lever) up or down to highlight the desired frame size and aspect ratio (â‘ ) and press the stick right.
   - Choose !4K Icon **16:9** or !DCI Icon **17:9** for 4K movies with aspect ratios of 16 or 17 to 9.
   - Choose !FHD Icon **16:9** or !FHD Icon **17:9** for Full HD movies with aspect ratios of 16 or 17 to 9.
